item.title: LU
item.description: score:21 Chances: Lufax Holding Ltd. has been operating a technology-empowered personal financial services platform since 2005, offering personal lending and wealth management solutions. The company recently announced its unaudited financial results for the fourth quarter and full year, showing potential for growth and profitability.
